thread.title: Texans' Foster leaves game against Colts with injury
thread.title_full: Texans' Foster leaves game against Colts with injury

title: Texans' Foster leaves game against Colts with injury
text:
George Bridges Texans' Foster leaves game against Colts with injury 
Houston Texans' Arian Foster (23) runs against the Indianapolis Colts during the first half of an NFL football game Thursday, Oct. 8, 2015, in Houston. (AP Photo/George Bridges) Posted: Thursday, October 8, 2015 9:54 pm Texans' Foster leaves game against Colts with injury Associated Press | 
HOUSTON (AP) — Houston running back Arian Foster has left in the second quarter against Indianapolis with an unspecified injury. 
Foster was injured after taking a hard hit with about 4 minutes left in the second quarter. He remained on the field for a couple of minutes while trainers looked at him before walking off the field. He came back in two plays later and carried the ball for no gain before going to the locker room. Subscription Required An online service is needed to view this article in its entirety.
